title: Marissa Roth, Photojournalist
itunes:title: Marissa Roth, Photojournalist
itunes:subtitle: Marissa Roth, Pulitzer Prize winning photojournalist, joins me on the podcast to talk about her pictures of the 1992 LA riots and lifetime of war photography, especially dealing with women in war.
description:
Marissa Roth, Pulitzer Prize winning photojournalist, joins me on the podcast to talk about her pictures of the 1992 LA riots and lifetime of war photography, especially dealing with women in war.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
